description:
Unity's C# stateless physics library.

Built on top of the Unity C# ECS framework, Unity Physics is network-ready, completely customizable, and built for performance out of the box. Whether you're building the next mobile hit or a new networked multiplayer console experience, Unity Physics leverages the Burst compiler and Job system to scale across a range of hardware.
name: com.unity.physics

samples.description: Provides a custom authoring experience for creating rigid bodies and colliders for Unity Physics.

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
* Updated entities packages dependencies

### Changed

* Documentation updates
* Updated Burst dependency to version 1.8.17
* Updated Unity Test Framework dependency to version 1.4.5

### Fixed

* Fixed an issue with negative collider scales during baking. Negative scales in GameObjects are now correctly interpreted and can be used to correctly flip GameObjects together with their associated colliders.
